Class HelperUtil

java.lang.Object
org.com.Utils.HelperUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class HelperUtil extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains helper methods to perform small operations.

  • Method Details

    • constructAttributeHashMap

      public static HashMap<String,Integer> constructAttributeHashMap(String[] p_attributeName, Integer[] p_attributeValue, Integer p_attributesCount)
      Constructs a HashMap from the given attribute names and values.
      Parameters:
      p_attributeName - Array of attribute names.
      p_attributeValue - Array of attribute values.
      p_attributesCount - Number of attributes.
      Returns:
      A HashMap with attribute names as keys and attribute values as values.

    • getContinentById

      public static String getContinentById(Set<Continent> p_continents, int p_id)
      Retrieves the name of a continent by its ID.
      Parameters:
      p_continents - Set of Continent objects.
      p_id - The ID of the continent to find.
      Returns:
      The name of the continent with the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getCountryByCountryName

      public static Country getCountryByCountryName(String p_countryName, Map p_gameMap)
      Retrieves a country by its name from the game map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryName - The name of the country to search for.
      p_gameMap - The game map containing all countries.
      Returns:
      The Country object with the matching name, or null if not found.

    • getPlayerByName

      public static Player getPlayerByName(String p_playerName, List<Player> p_playersList)
      Retrieves a player by their name from a list of players.
      Parameters:
      p_playerName - The name of the player to search for.
      p_playersList - The list of players to search within.
      Returns:
      The Player object with the matching name, or null if not found.

    • setCountryOwnerShip

      public static void setCountryOwnerShip(Player p_player, Country p_country, boolean p_isNeutralize)
      Updates the ownership of a country.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The player to whom the country ownership is being assigned.
      p_country - The country whose ownership is being updated.
      p_isNeutralize - If true, neutralizes the country (removes ownership and resets army count).

    • getPlayerHighestArmyCountry

      public static Country getPlayerHighestArmyCountry(Player l_player)
      Retrieves the country with the highest number of armies owned by the specified player.
      Parameters:
      l_player - The player whose countries are being evaluated.
      Returns:
      The country with the highest army count owned by the player, or null if the player has no countries.

    • getStrongestNeighbouringEnemyCountry

      public static Country getStrongestNeighbouringEnemyCountry(Player p_currentPlayer, Map p_gameMap)
      Retrieves the country with the most armies owned by a player other than the current player.
      Parameters:
      p_currentPlayer - The current player.
      p_gameMap - The game map.
      Returns:
      The country with the most armies owned by another player, or null if not found.

    • getRandomNeighbouringEnemyCountry

      public static Country getRandomNeighbouringEnemyCountry(Country p_country, Map p_gameMap, Player p_currentPlayer)
      Retrieves a random neighboring enemy country for the given player and country.
      Parameters:
      p_country - The country whose neighbors are being checked.
      p_gameMap - The game map containing all countries and their relationships.
      p_currentPlayer - The current player whose ownership is being considered.
      Returns:
      A random neighboring enemy country, or null if none exist.
